评论详情: color was what I wanted, fabric was soft and comfortable, and washed well. Runs big, especially at the shoulders, but otherwise nice.

I do not understand why this has over a 4 star rating. It is not worth 30 dollars. This is very thin. It is similar to a shiny dri-fit material. There is no fleece or sweatshirt material in this. I regret purchasing this top. If you are looking for a sweatshirt pullover, this is not a good choice.
I got the gray sweater and it shows underarm sweat so quickly. My undershirt won’t have any sweat markers, but the sweater will make it look like I just ran a mile.

love this! i’m 5’9” and about 200lbs. i ordered an xl and it fits great. its not thick like a sweatshirt but not too thin either. i ordered the sky blue color and its tru to the color that is in the pictures. also, a plus that its not cropped or too short. i have returned so many sweatshirts because they are not long enough and can be unflattering unless you are thin. just ordered another!

I am a big fan of the hoodie style, but don't like the hood. This top is perfect - quarter zip, front pouch pocket, thick and warm, but no hood. I have now purchased 3 of these. One thing to know, this top is not fleece lined, so don't expect that, but it is thicker than some pullovers and I find it to be warm and comfortable.  I wear a medium or large in tops - depends on cut and purpose. I am 5'6" about 140lbs and I can actually wear this is both a medium and large - I don't find the large to be a whole lot bigger than the medium.  The rose color and purple are just as shown on my computer screen. The dark blue, not so much - I was not expecting navy blue based on the picture, but that is what it basically is.

I am in love with this top!!! It is thin enough to wear in fall and think enough to wear with a jacket in the winter. It is very flattering with jeans or leggings. I do wish I could find it in a longer version as it does not cover all of the booty. It lays perfect, the collar does not bunch or roll. I want one in every color. Too bad I am doing no spend 2025. I will add one to all my Amazon list for the year. Surely somebody will get me another one.
Really cute and nicely made.  Seems like good quality material and pretty color.
Very happy with this top. Fits nice, feels comfortable and washes well. I haven’t had any issues with it yet and it’s been washed and dried many times. Ordering a second one!
Christmas gift to my daughter in-law bought in two colors she loves 1/4 zip and pockets she only wished it had a hood most important she loves them bought size Med her normal size fits her great
I’m 5’8 and 135lbs and this fits super good! I love the color (I think I got pink or purple) definitely some wiggle room but also isn’t too baggy!

I ordered a white sweatshirt, then a pink sweatshirt and also a gray sweatshirt. The white one and the gray one was fine, but...the pink one. OMG, It stinks so bad I had to take it outside. I laundered it and it still stinks. WHY?

I bought this as a nursing sweatshirt and it’s great! Super comfy and long in the torso which I need. I got a large and I’m 5’7 around 190. I wanted a bigger size since I’m losing baby weight but I can definitely still wear this once I get to my normal size. Definitely a good  purchase!  Will probably order more in other colors.

I purchased a similar style from a different brand that is a soft oversized sweatshirt. I am typically satisfied with items from the PrettyGarden shop, but this is not labeled as PrettyGarden and it is a thick polyester/nylon feel (think warm up pants). If you’re looking for a casual long sleeve, this might be what you are looking for. But, if you’re expecting a cozy sweatshirt, look at other brands.
Love it so much that I Bought several.  Excellent quality.

I was very disappointed when I received this.  It's not a thick warm sweatshirt at all.  It's a thin slick material like you would find in athletic wear.  Looks nothing like the pictures advertised.  This definitely would not be a cozy sweatshirt to keep me warm in frigid temperatures.  Beware if that's what you're looking for look elsewhere.  Returning.
Very cheap looking with cheap material. Looks nothing like the advertised photos.
Super comfortable, very fashionable. Have it in multiple colors
I didn't love the fabric

评论概述: Pretty color but fabric not what was expected
评论详情: The color I chose was orange, but it was closer to a salmon color, but still pretty and style was what I expected, too. The problem I had was with the inside of the fabric. I expected it be like a regular cotton fleece but instead it was a shiny knit which, unfortunately, feels cold against my skin when worn and not as breathable. I don't want to have to wear a long sleeve tshirt underneath this all the time, especially when the weather gets warmer.

评论概述: Product received not like the picture
评论详情: Product received was nothing like the picture.  Different material, different color. I ordered the pink.  Very see through. Was a much litter color, and the material was more rayon/slippery than what the picture looks like. Size was as expected.

I searched “nursing tops” and this came up. It looked nice, every other nursing top looked very obviously nursing and had odd hems or bulging bits. I saw the seams and thought they were discreet nursing access zippers (they’re not). I guess Amazon pulled this into the search results because the front zip goes low enough you probably could nurse in it but the zipper teeth seem like they’d bother bare skin so I’m returning. Not what I was looking for.

I thought this was going to be fleece on the inside but it is a weird polyester fabric.  The shirt also runs very large. I am keeping it because I like the color but will definitely have to wear a t.shirt or cami under it.

The product description says this sweatshirt is 50% cotton as does the tag on the inside of it. I don’t think so! This garment is slick and shiny - not traits of cotton fabric! I feel the manufacturer misled me and will not be buying any other products from them. I will try to find a hoodless sweatshirt on Amazon that really does have cotton in it as described.
I didnt' like the material
I love these tops but they get very pilly after several washes. Both inside and outside. I still wear them but they are no longer soft on the inside and the outside is rough.
Fabric is shiny thin polyester and not cotton sweatshirt material that it appears to be in the ad.
It’s a cute style, but the color pink is not as pictured.  It’s a true baby pink.

The material of this sweatshirt is a nice weight.  It’s not too thick or too thin.  I also like the snap design.  However, I was looking for a sweatshirt that would cover my backside while wearing leggings, and the pictures online showed it to be that long.  It also showed that the bottom of the shirt tapered.  However, neither of these things are true with what I received.  It only covers about half of my backside, and the bottom edge is straight across.It’s a nice sweatshirt, just not what I thought I was buying.I’m 5’7” for reference and purchased a M.

评论概述: Cute Bought as Gift-Too Short-Not Covering Enough
评论详情: What she liked.  The Kangaroo pocket, softness of the material, larger collar.  However we are about the same size (5' 4" and 110 lbs) and without needing to try it on...when holding the top up, it did not cover enough in front or in the back.  Purchased during Black Friday sale, not worth keeping it even at that price.  Returning

This is NOT a sweatshirt.  Made of very thin cheap material.  Looks cheap. Shiny and clingy. Not comfortable at all as a sweatshirt should be. If you looking for comfortable,  warm and looks good quality,  do not buy this.
Love this sweatshirt!  Really like the quarter zip, so easy to slip on or off.  Think I’m sold on that style. Very nice quality fabric.  True to fit. I purchased a medium  I’m 5’6” 147 lb
This is not 50% Cotton more like 100% polyester will be returning this. Have another one on the way that will also go back. Definitely not worth $36+ 🙁

I ordered this product in 2021. It was great! Met all expectations. But this year I received a lesser quality product. It's light weight and doesn't show correct label for product. I feel mislead. Lighter weight than first purchase.
Did not like this sweatshirt it not what I wanted.

评论概述: I really liked it. Buying another one
评论详情: Great fit. Great material. Nice color. Getting another one.

Im not a fan of the drab green color. It is not the same color as the photo shows. But my daughter will probably love it! It's a good spring time apparel for some gardening. Light weight material and not as good of quality as expected.

评论详情: beautiful style and color, love the fit.. HATE THE FABRIC. going to keep it anyways but feel like i was duped.

评论概述: My favorite shirt of the season!
评论详情: Great style, nice fabric, comfortable and washes up great!  I will order in more colors.
Made from a soft, stretchy, and comfortable fabric which makes it perfect for a sports event or casual work day. Lightweight stylish and true to size.

absolutely HORRIBLE quality. nothing like the pictures. it is so thin and the material is so cheap. there is so many good reviews and the photos attached look nothing like the sweatshirt i received!! don’t waste your money and buy something more high quality!
Color was too light, didn’t match the picture.  Not pleased with the fabric. Not sure I want to keep it.

My first impression was that the fabric was a little weird and the color is tan, not grey.  I tried it on, it looked super cute.  I got used to the fabric and kept it, still not a huge fan of the color.  I love the style and will order more.
Quality, thicker material but not hot like fleece. Very soft and comfortable. The pink color is very pretty in person. Good purchase.

I love the feel of the material but can't wear it to too many places as it looks aeful due to the wrinkles. I have ironed (using a wrinkle releaser) steamed it, washed and dried it and it is still very wrinkled.
Loved the fit and comfort - runs big so buy a size down
Love the style,  fit is true to size. Awesome value for the price. I highly recommend this shirt.
The sweater fit well.
This top is okay, not as heavy and soft as I was expecting. True to size and bright color, not a $30+ value but it’ll be great for work, which is why I bought it. Not sure if I’ll get other colors.

Loved everything about this sweatshirt!  The material is not super thick and wears well with another layer underneath.  Also love the fact that the collar is wide without a hood that adds so much bulk.  I'm ordering 2 other colors!
I love the fit, feel, big pocket.  Got here just in time for chilly weather in Florida .  Washes and dries beautifully.
I don't know why are they even allowed to use the word "cotton"? The fabric they're using should be under $10.

First, the color looks burnt orange when it us actually a very muddy brown. Second, it has very hard wrinkles in it that even a hot iron can't smooth out. As for size. I'm five feet tall and it covers down to the top of my legs. The quality seems OK, but it doesn't look as cute as the picture.

评论概述: Cold Fabric; Not like the other colors
评论详情: This yellow/mustard color fourth one of these sweatshirts I ordered, but the fabric for this color is different. It is very cold, not like the other three colors I ordered. Unlike the other three I have (same exact brand, style, etc, I have to wear a shirt under it to stay warm! I missed the return window because I did not want to wear it until last week. Unfortunately, after I relaunder it, I will be donating it to one of the used items collection companies. Very disappointed. I recommend the other colors, just not this yellow color because of the fabric.

Love these sweatshirts. Ordered 3, black, light pink & wine. They look great with leggings. So far material does not snag. I have washed the light pink and it turned out like new. I only hang dry my shirts so don’t know how they would do in dryer. Can’t beat the price. Have gotten lots of compliments on them.

I got the black with buttons which are actually big shiny silver snaps. I did not like the look of that. I also got the light blue with the zipper. The zipper is quite stiff and doesn’t work well, also feels like it would snag other fabric. Both are very oversized. While I was looking for something to layer over a thinner shirt, these were just too big. Returning both.

I bought this specifically to have more clothes I could easily breastfeed in. The zipper zips far enough down that I can easily open it to nurse. The zip-up is an athletic material not a soft sweatshirt. It’s also on the lighter side for warmth, so great for fall. I love the color and the fit. It’s flattering and I don’t feel insecure in my not so thin postpartum body.

评论概述: Great purchase! So soft and well made!
评论详情: I love this so much that I’m ordering more. These are very well-made. The shape and fit is that of something much more expensive. They are so soft! I would definitely recommend this product. I’m 5’3” and weigh around 140-145 pounds. I ordered the medium and it is perfect!
I got a light baby pink color. Not the mauve I ordered. Material is not cotton but a sheer polyester and cheap/ thin feeling.
I do like the fit.  The zipper has smooth performance.  I love the color.
Very soft top,color is as depicted.
Cant gget the wrinkles out havent been able to wear it its like i threq money away they pkg these and do t think about whats happening to the clothes another bad spend
True size
I like the fit and color. I would buy it again.

Thin and doesn't feel like 50% cotton.  Not a sweatshirt

Bought a sage colored one in 2023 and decided to add more.  Bought 2 this fall and the sizing was way off and the fabric was not a sweatshirt material, but a polyester fabric.  Love my original purchase, but they can keep this year's stash.

Got this to wear with scrubs while I’m working and it gets cold. Super comfy, love the pocket to put stuff in, material seems like it would easily wipe down, easy to go on and off with the large neck and still have access to all my doodads that hang off your top as a nurse. Sleeves have stretch so I can pull them up if things get messy. Warm but not too warm. New favorite for work. I did pull out the drawstring on the neck and got rid of it as it didn’t do much and was a hazard of getting something gross on it or having a patient grab it. This top is like if a hoody had a baby with a windbreaker. Love it.
So comfortable and a beautiful color. I purchased the red. Washed well and hung to dry. True to size
It's not fluffy and soft, but it's very comfortable. Great Color seems to wash well.

评论概述: Not as it shows in the picture
评论详情: I was looking forward to wear it but, not that long to cover if you wear leggings and not enough room in the upper body. Returning.

Sweatshirt was soft and comfortable, but it was so oversized and sloppy that I couldn’t keep it - not even just to wear around the house.  As someone else mentioned, the collar was awkward too - neither open nor zipped up looked great.

I bought and X-Large, fits a little big, but I wanted to cover my butt when I wear leggings. I also can wash and dry and don’t need to worry about shrinking. I  love the front pocket. It’s soft and comfortable.
The color was not pleasing and the material was very cheap looking.
Very cheap version of free people sweatshirt. Not the same material and  it’s definitely NOT the shirt you see in the picture!
Cute fit and style. Expected a different material but I like it enough to wear.

I love this water zip up. It is a soft material, and on the thinner side so it's not super heavy. It is spacious enough to also wear another layer underneath too! I liked it so much I bought one in another color!

I originally ordered this button oversized sweater a few months ago in Orange pink, and I love it! I love it so much I wanted it in more colors. So I ordered a black one... when it arrived I was confused. The material is completely different, instead of being more of a cotton/polyester blend which it claims to be (which is what my orange/pink sweater is) it's a shiny, spandex material. Not only did they cheap out on the material but the cut and style is completely different as well. I was hoping this was a one off, and sent it back, and ordered a different color (green) and it was exactly the same as the cheap looking black sweater that was returned. It's just a huge disappointment that corners are obviously being cut to make an extra buck. I would've continued to buy these sweaters for myself and others if the quality had remained the same. But they are way to cheap looking/feeling now. Not a fan anymore.
Bought light blue and green. One for my niece and one for me. True to size. Good weight for Florida.
Not as appeared on web site

评论概述: Nice styling,  but stains that won't come out. Including simple coffee.
评论详情: The fabric stains will not come out. I however love the style. I want to purchase again. Usually I'm very careful with clothes and have had some that last years. Buy at your own risk!
Love this taupe/brown top. Perfect weight for Arizona winters. My usual size, medium, was big on me so I returned it and ordered it in a small- now a perfect fit!
Liked it but needed warmer
TTS. Material is different than expected. It has a slick feel and much thinner than I thought it would be.
Silky and comfortable. Kept me cozy on a plane, but not so warm you overheat. Perfect sweatshirt. Will definitely buy more colors!

评论概述: Definitely Polyester, not normal sweatshirt material.
评论详情: I don't hate this. The color is a brighter red than pictures. I love the zipper and the collar. It is very smooth polyester and it is soft, but stiffer than a regular fleece sweatshirt. Seems more like a jacket type wear than just a sweatshirt pullover. I would have ordered a Large for more of an oversized look.
my wife loves the pockets, and the collar.  Fits great and she likes the feel of the fabric on her body.  Not rough.

Love this pullover. It's so soft. A little shiny but that's ok.  It fits perfect and it's just long enough to wear with leggings but not too long with jeans. I'm going to order another in a different color...perhaps two more!
The style and comfort are great!
Love. Love the fit, style, comfort, colors. I'll live in these this winter!
Love this cozy outfit

Hoping I can buff them down w/ some sandpaper perhaps.

评论详情: I got the wine red and it is actually apple red. Otherwise everything else is great, comfy fabric, good fit. I'm keeping it but would've preferred actual wine red.
This was advertised as a cotton blend but it is a very odd material- polyester.  Thick and oddly slick. The shoulders are enormous but the bottom bad is tight. Definitely not for a more pear shape.
Love this so much! I ordered an XL but ended up returning for a Large and it fits perfectly! I am 165 lbs, 5'4. The colors are great and it's SO soft on the inside and outside. Five stars!

Overall, this isn't bad but the color is not the same. Instead of what is pictured, I got a light pink that is see through. Also the zipper is cheap.
